dmca.title: Copyright
dmca.body:
EMAIL

http://www.hoosierhillsinc.com/landscaping-news/an-easy-way-to-improve-your-curb-appeal-for-next-spring/

**This complainant already has a signature on file with us. Below is the latest request:


Thanks for your help.
 
This offending web site has now stolen another blog article of mine - complete with my copyright notice.
 
Here's the link to my blog's article: http://[private].wordpress.com/2007/09/01/an-easy-way-to-improve-your-curb-appeal-for-next-spring/
 
Here's the stolen link on the thief's site: http://www.hoosierhillsinc.com/landscaping-news/an-easy-way-to-improve-your-curb-appeal-for-next-spring/
 
I noticed that there are other stolen articles as well. I certainly hope you shut these plagiarizers down!!!!!!
 
[private]
Real Living HER
[private]
email:  [private]
web site:  [private]
blog:  [private]
